entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who yelled and punched the air in excitement.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as looking faint with anxiety when Harry entered the kitchen.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as entering the kitchen and being held by Hermione.

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is wiping her face on her apron.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred and his siblings are doing a war dance to chant Harry's name.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is part of the group doing the war dance.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is part of the group doing the war dance.

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is shouting to quiet down his family.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as being present and reacting sharply when he heard about Lucius Malfoy.

entities.name: lucius malfoy
entities.description: Lucius Malfoy is mentioned as talking to Fudge at the Ministry.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is mentioned as being talked to by Lucius Malfoy.

relationships.description: Ron is excited about Harry's acquittal, yelling and punching the air.
Hermione is concerned for Harry's well-being, looking faint with anxiety when he entered the kitchen.
Fred and George are part of a group doing a war dance to chant Harry's name.
Ginny is celebrating with Harry, part of the group doing the war dance.
Mr. Weasley is a parent to his family members who are celebrating Harry's acquittal.
Sirius reacts sharply when he hears about Lucius Malfoy talking to Fudge at the Ministry.
Fudge is being talked to by Lucius Malfoy at the Ministry.
